TextView.android:text: Our Application is monitoring all the activities of smartphones. It will show you that how much you have use a particular application which is in the smartphone. So,you will understand that how much your time is spent. now, you will have to set alarm to early wake up. The main focus of this application is to reduce the smartphone addiction and utilize your time in a proper way. Using our appication,user can set notification reminder when user have to remind important task or work, that time this feature is very helpful. Using widget, user can set Use Stopwatch to stay in focus mode. Using night mode, user can enhance the experiance of our app. Using Generate Report, user can generate Report of usage so, user can share with other user of our app. Using Tips, user can read the helpful tips and change the life and can leave the addiction of smartphone.
